meta.title: SGP Yoga - Events
meta.description: Join our transformative yoga workshops, retreats, and teacher training programs

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.subtitle: We regularly offer themed workshops, transformative retreats, and comprehensive teacher trainings

event1.title: Breathwork Fundamentals
event1.shortDescription: Learn ancient breathing techniques to calm the mind and energize the body
event1.fullDescription: Discover the transformative power of conscious breathing in this comprehensive workshop. You'll learn pranayama techniques from various yoga traditions, understand the science behind breathwork, and experience guided practices that reduce stress, increase energy, and promote deep relaxation. Suitable for all levels.
event1.whatToBring: Comfortable clothing, yoga mat, water bottle, journal

event2.title: Yoga & Nature Immersion
event2.shortDescription: A four-day retreat that combines yoga, spiritual philosophy, and connection to nature.
event2.fullDescription: This general-purpose retreat is meant to help you rejuvenate and regain harmony through Vinyasa and Kundalini Yoga. Our space in Salento is truly special; we will have several hikes to mountaintops, lakes and waterfalls. We will also cover the theoretical principles behind yoga and spirituality, touch mayan calendar knowledge, and connect through sharing circles and other activities. Food & accommodation are included, but transportation to the retreat place is at your own cost. For those who want to see a bit of Colombia, it is possible to extend the retreat by 1 day for a trip to Valle de Cócora for 1,000 MXN more.

event3.title: 50-Hour Aerial Yoga Teacher Training
event3.shortDescription: Become an aerial yoga teacher with our specialized training program.
event3.fullDescription: Aerial yoga is getting increasingly popular, not only because it looks great, but also because it makes more advanced poses accessible to beginners from day 1. Our 50-Hour hybrid program is ideal for yoga teachers who want to expand their repertoire, but you can also participate as an absolute beginner. Our sessions will take place over the weekends in the beautiful Yoguitería in Calarca, Colombia. Although designed primarily as an in-person experience, this teacher training can be taken partially online - but two in-person weekends are required to obtain your Yoga Alliance certification.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Our workshops are short but intensive sessions that explore specific aspects of yoga. We often blend physical exercise with breathwork, meditation, sound healing, and yogic philosophy - going beyond what's possible during a traditional class.

retreats.title: Retreats
retreats.description: To us, a retreat is a step back from the hectic reality of our daily lives. Our retreats are tailored to help you heal & transform, at the same time giving you space to rest and regain balance.

trainings.title: Teacher Trainings
trainings.description: The highest joy of a teacher is to see their students become wonderful yogis. Our teacher trainings give you all the tools you need to begin sharing the practice of yoga with the world. All our programmes come with an internationally-recognized Yoga Alliance certification and cover all the essential modules such as alignment, anatomy, philosophy, and more.
